pli-tv-pvr2.4:5.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:5.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ tīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
pli-tv-pvr2.4:5.3: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena … pe …. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.4:6.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
pli-tv-pvr2.4:6.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
